module.description: Support module name, normally the repo name
module.title: Module

dbds.description: List of dbds the support module creates. Used to build a list for linking into the IOC
dbds.title: Dbds

libs.description: List of libraries the support module creates. Used to build a list for linking into the IOC
libs.title: Libs

organization.description: The git organization that owns the support module.Used to generate the git remote from organization/module
organization.title: Organization

git_repo.description: The git repository that contains the support module.Used to generate the git remote from organization/module
git_repo.title: Git Repo

macro.description: The macro used in configure/RELEASE for this module.Defaults to the module name in uppercase
macro.title: Macro

remove_macros.description: List of macros to remove from configure/RELEASE.Sets MACRO_NAME= in the RELEASE.local file
remove_macros.title: Remove Macros

apt_developer.description: List of apt packages to install in the developer target.Uses the ubuntu package manager or deb files from download_extras
apt_developer.title: Apt Developer

apt_runtime.description: List of apt packages to install in the runtime target.Uses the ubuntu package manager or deb files from download_extras
apt_runtime.title: Apt Runtime

download_extras.description: List of extra files to download (e.g. apt packages)
download_extras.title: Download Extras

local_path.description: Local path to the support module inside the conatiner.Defaults to epics/support/<module>
local_path.title: Local Path

comment_out.description: List of files to comment out lines in.Used unecessary lines from Makefiles to keep the build small
comment_out.title: Comment Out

patch_lines.description: List of files to patch lines in.Used to add extra flags to Makefiles, CONFIG_SITE etc.
patch_lines.title: Patch Lines

patch_file.description: Apply a patch file to the repo.Optionally specify a commit to apply the patch to
